overview: Jawhara has grown in prison after the rape of her mother, Safia, and has lived for six years behind bars by her mother's side.  Through her innocent vision, Jawhara grew up looking and watching the world of families telling the story that brought her mother together with her alleged father Saeed. Saeed and Safiya lived together a period of youth marked by enthusiasm and ideal values.  Inhuman living conditions.  Jewel's search for the truth of her mother and father's story leads her to tragedy...
title: Jawhara Fille de Prison
